definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

pinyin: ka3 bu4 qi2 nuo4 ka1 fei1

sentences.english: Then we don't sound like weirdos.
sentences.chinese: 這樣聽起來纔不會像怪咖。

sentences.english: "Geek" is the circus guy who bites the head off of live animals.
sentences.chinese: “怪咖”是在馬戲團中把動物的頭要下來的人。
我認爲每個人都是怪咖。

sentences.english: When asked to describe myself, I usually say that I am weird, Why?
sentences.chinese: 如果要我描述自己，我會說我是個怪咖。

sentences.english: Yes, even with jerks, you have to be objective.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，即使對付怪咖，你也得保持客觀的態度。

sentences.english: Newsboys were known for being loud and intrusive, much like the Scout.
sentences.chinese: 和偵察兵一樣，報童常常被視爲是吵雜的嗨咖。

sentences.english: I did a lot of research into figuring out the difference between nerd and geek.
sentences.chinese: 我在書呆子和怪咖的區別上做了很多研究。

sentences.english: Next week Kaxiaoxi will respond to this.
sentences.chinese: 下週，咖小西將回應此張照片。

sentences.english: He is a leader in the sign-making industry – a real big gun, if you know what I mean.
sentences.chinese: 他是廣告牌製作行業的領軍人物，一位真正的大咖。

sentences.english: The Internet is really appealing. Many students are addicted to playing games in Internet cafes .
sentences.chinese: 網路真的很吸引人，許多學生沉溺於在網咖裏打電玩。

sentences.english: But we called the book "Being Geek" because that sounds great.
sentences.chinese: 但我的書叫做《做個怪咖》是因爲聽起來很炫。

sentences.english: Dinewan the EmuBralagah the Brolga were two such animals.
sentences.chinese: 其中鴯鶓代萬和澳洲鶴布拉咖這樣的兩頭巨型猛獸。

sentences.english: Maca polysaccharide has definite effect of antioxidation in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 瑪咖多糖體外具有一定的抗氧化保健作用。

sentences.english: He spends all his time in the cyber caf?
sentences.chinese: 他把所有時間都花在網咖裏。

sentences.english: Bralagah got angry and grabbed one of Dinewan's large eggs and hurled it into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 布拉咖發怒了他抓起代萬的一個大鳥蛋擲向天空。

definition: big shot (leading some field or group)/godfather
currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
a favorite of sb in power/a celebrity/American Indian
(neologism c. 2014) celebrity with a huge, devoted fan base/celebrity with a huge following on social media
